metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The transform_save function in transform.c in Augeas before 1.0.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information via a symlink attack on a .augnew file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

augeas-lenses - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
augeas-tools - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
libaugeas0 - 1.1.0-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> An incomplete fix for this bug resulted in CVE-2013-6412.

criterions.comment: augeas package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-0ubuntu2').
